wikipedia_page.main: Mabel Esther Allan (11 February 1915 – 14 May 1998) was a British author of about 170 children's books.

response: *Mabel Esther Allan (1915–1998) – Over the Sea to School, Ballet for Drina, The Ballet Family

Other Fidra Books authors have included Olivia FitzRoy, Anne Digby,Overview of Trebizon series. Victoria Walker, Primrose Cumming, Elinor Lyon,Reissued titles described. Mabel Esther Allan, and Ruby Ferguson. These books have reappeared as larger-format paperbacks with thick paper and stiff card covers. Fidra Books uses in its reprints elements of the original dust wrapper; all contain a forward.
